backend/main.mo: Actor handling membership and free trial form submissions with validation, ID assignment, storage, and retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing short descriptions of multiple frontend pages and components.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS defining light and dark theme variables using OKLCH values with Tailwind layers.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting SEO metadata, font preloads, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router configuration with all site routes and a ThemeProvider defaulting to light mode.
frontend/src/components/contact/MapAndCo: Section displaying an embedded Google Map and contact details styled with cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/contact/QuickCon: Floating quick‑contact widget offering WhatsApp and phone actions with tooltips and hide control.
frontend/src/components/forms/FreeTrialB: Form component for booking a free trial session, handling validation and submission via a mutation hook with success UI states.
frontend/src/components/forms/OnlineMemb: Form component for submitting online membership applications with validation, mutation-based submission, and success feedback.
frontend/src/components/gallery/BeforeAf: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Displays a grid of images with a lightbox modal, supporting navigation between images.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutSectio: Renders an About section highlighting gym features using cards and icon-based descriptions.
frontend/src/components/home/BeforeAfter: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: Hero banner with background image, marketing text, and navigation buttons for membership and contact.
frontend/src/components/home/MembershipP: Shows preview cards of membership plans with pricing, features, and CTA buttons to join.
frontend/src/components/home/ProgramsPre: Displays a grid of popular training programs with icons and descriptions, plus a link to view more.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Renders a testimonials grid using cards, avatars, and star ratings for member feedback.
frontend/src/components/home/TrainerPrev: Displays a preview of three trainers using TrainerCard and includes navigation to the full trainers page.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyChooseSe: Shows a grid of gym advantages with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Implements responsive header navigation with desktop links, mobile sheet menu, and a Join Now button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Provides footer with business info, quick links, social icons, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps pages with header, footer, main outlet, and quick contact actions.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Displays program details with icon, description, benefits list, and buttons for enrollment or contact.
frontend/src/components/trainers/Trainer: Shows trainer profile card with image, role, specialty, and certification badges.
frontend/src/content/blogPosts.ts: Defines BlogPost interface and a list of detailed blog posts with HTML content.
frontend/src/content/business.ts: Exports basic business information like name, contact details, and hours.
frontend/src/content/faq.ts: Defines the FaqItem interface and exports an array of FAQ questions and answers for the gym site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Custom hook that updates the document title and meta description when pages load.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutations for submitting membership and free trial forms via the backend actor and invalidates relevant queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables defining theme colors and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wrapping the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, values, and story sections, and sets page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog posts with metadata and navigation to individual post pages.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Renders a single blog post based on the slug, with navigation back and dynamic page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with meta tags, a free trial booking form, and a map/contact section.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Displays FAQ items in an accordion layout with page metadata and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery of facility images with metadata and a gallery grid component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage by rendering hero, about, programs, memberships, testimonials, trainers, and contact sections.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPlansPage.t: Presents membership plans with pricing, features, and an online membership form.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Lists various fitness programs with icons, descriptions, and benefit details.
frontend/src/pages/TrainersPage.tsx: Displays trainer profiles using TrainerCard components with page metadata.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current website design goals, theme requirements, and architectural notes for a premium gym site. Lists existing implemented features and overall project state metadata.
